类的使用
javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

  • 使用HttpServlet的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina.manager  
    org.apache.catalina.manager.host  
    org.apache.catalina.servlets
    This package contains Servlets that implement some of the standard functionality provided by the Catalina servlet container.
    org.apache.catalina.ssi
    This package contains code that is used by the SsiInvoker.
    org.apache.catalina.websocket  
    org.apache.jasper.runtime  
    org.apache.jasper.servlet  

    • org.apache.catalina.manager中HttpServlet的使用

      org.apache.catalina.manager中HttpServlet的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  HTMLManagerServlet
      Servlet that enables remote management of the web applications deployed within the same virtual host as this web application is.
      class  JMXProxyServlet
      This servlet will dump JMX attributes in a simple format and implement proxy services for modeler.
      class  ManagerServlet
      Servlet that enables remote management of the web applications installed within the same virtual host as this web application is.
      class  StatusManagerServlet
      This servlet will display a complete status of the HTTP/1.1 connector.

    • org.apache.catalina.manager.host中HttpServlet的使用

      org.apache.catalina.manager.host中HttpServlet的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  HostManagerServlet
      Servlet that enables remote management of the virtual hosts installed on the server.
      class  HTMLHostManagerServlet
      Servlet that enables remote management of the virtual hosts deployed on the server.

    • org.apache.catalina.servlets中HttpServlet的使用

      org.apache.catalina.servlets中HttpServlet的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  CGIServlet
      CGI-invoking servlet for web applications, used to execute scripts which comply to the Common Gateway Interface (CGI) specification and are named in the path-info used to invoke this servlet.
      class  DefaultServlet
      The default resource-serving servlet for most web applications, used to serve static resources such as HTML pages and images.
      class  WebdavServlet
      Servlet which adds support for WebDAV level 2.

    • org.apache.catalina.ssi中HttpServlet的使用

      org.apache.catalina.ssi中HttpServlet的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  SSIServlet
      Servlet to process SSI requests within a webpage.

    • org.apache.catalina.websocket中HttpServlet的使用

      org.apache.catalina.websocket中HttpServlet的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  WebSocketServlet
      已过时。 
      Replaced by the JSR356 WebSocket 1.1 implementation and will be removed in Tomcat 8.0.x.

    • org.apache.jasper.runtime中HttpServlet的使用

      org.apache.jasper.runtime中HttpServlet的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  HttpJspBase
      This is the super class of all JSP-generated servlets.

    • org.apache.jasper.servlet中HttpServlet的使用

      org.apache.jasper.servlet中HttpServlet的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  JspServlet
      The JSP engine (a.k.a Jasper).
